支援艦隊を出撃させ、主力艦隊の\n進撃を援護せよ！\n(要:駆逐2隻):
Launch a support fleet and
cover the advance of the main
fleet!
(Required: 2 destroyers)
主力艦隊支援を行う別動隊を出撃\nさせ、艦隊決戦を援護せよ！\n(要:駆逐2隻):
Deploy a detached force to
cover the main fleet and
help in the decisive battle!
(Required: 2 destroyers)
鎮守府近海を航海し、艦隊の練度\nを高めよう！:
Let's sail around the Naval
Base to enhance the fleet's
proficiency!
外海まで足を延ばし、艦隊の練度\nを高めよう！:
Let's stretch our legs to the
open sea to enhance the fleet's
proficiency!
鎮守府担当海域をパトロールして\n領海の安全を守ろう！:
Let's patrol the waters
controlled by the Naval Base to
keep the territorial waters safe!
水雷戦隊を編成、領海内を索敵、\n対潜水警戒任務に就こう！:
Let's form a torpedo squadron,
and conduct an anti-submarine
patrol mission within territorial
waters!
輸送船団の安全を図るために、船\n団に同行し、これを護衛しよう！:
Let's accompany the convoy
group and escort it to safety!
敵艦載機襲来に備えて、対空射撃\nや回避運動の訓練をしよう！:
Let's practice anti-air and
evasion maneuvers to be
always ready for an enemy air
raid!
海の一大ページェント「観艦式」\nの予行航海を実施しよう！:
Let's prepare for a great
pageant; the 'Naval Review'
rehearsal!
今こそ日頃の訓練の成果を見せる\nとき！「観艦式」を挙行しよう！:
It's time to show the results of
our regular training! Let's
celebrate the 'Naval Review'!
港湾施設強化と兵站備蓄施設拡充\nに協力し、補給体制を強化せよ！:
Help us strengthening our port
facilities and our supply
system, as well as expanding
our logistics stockpile facilities.
海防艦や駆逐艦による、沿岸警備\n部隊で、海峡警備を実施しよう！:
Let's guard the strait with
coast guard units such as
destroyers and coastal defense
ships!
高練度の対潜部隊を展開、敵潜を\n制圧し、航路の安全を確保せよ！:
Deploy a highly proficient
anti-submarine unit, and
supress the enemy to ensure
safe passage in the sea route!
油田地帯航路の安全を確保する。\n対潜哨戒能力の高い海上護衛部隊\nを編成、南西:
Ensure the safety of the oil
field route. Form a highly
proficient anti-submarine
patrol fleet and deploy it to the
southwestern connecting line!
本土の守りの要、小笠原沖哨戒線\nに精強な哨戒小艦隊を展開する。\n敵遠征部隊と:
Deploy a proficient and well-
equipped small-sized fleet to
the Osagawara Patrol Line to
ensure the protection of the
mainland's keystone!
小笠原沖方面への敵部隊の接近を\n確認した！同方面防衛のため、最\n精鋭の哨戒艦:
Sir, we have confirmation of an
enemy force approaching off
the Ogasawara Coast! Form
a proficient patrol fleet, and
defeat the enemy!
油田地帯から燃料を満載して戻る\nタンカー船団を護衛しよう！:
Let's escort the fuel-loaded
tanker fleet back from the oil
fields!
水上偵察機搭載艦などを活用し、\n敵艦隊の動向を探れ！:
Keep an eye on the enemy
fleet's movements by using
seaplane-carrying ships!
資源集積地から、母港にボーキサ\nイトを輸送しよう！:
Let's transport bauxite from
the resource storage area to
the home port!
資源国からの輸送部隊を護衛し、\n母港への輸送を無事完遂しよう！:
Escort the convoy coming back
from the resource-rich country
and complete the transport to
the home port safely!
快速の水雷戦隊を集中運用して、\n激戦の諸島へ物資を輸送しよう！:
Let's transport supplies to the
frontlines using a fast torpedo
squadron!
機動力のある小艦艇部隊を結集、\n包囲下の部隊を収容しよう！:
Let's mobilize a small-sized
vessel group with high
mobility, and bring back the
besieged troops!
囮機動部隊支援作戦: Decoy Naval Task Force Support Operation
敵機動部隊を誘引する空母を含む\n囮部隊で主力艦隊を支援しよう！:
Let's try to support the main
fleet with decoy forces,
including aircraft carriers, to
attract enemy task forces!
有力な艦隊を編成し、敵背後側面\nを奇襲、艦隊決戦を援護しよう！:
Form a formidable fleet to
provide cover for the decisive
battle by surprising the
enemy's rear flank!
索敵力の高い水上機母艦及び軽巡\nを伴う艦隊で敵情勢を偵察せよ！:
Conduct reconnaissance of the
enemy's situation with a fleet
of seaplane tenders and light
cruisers with high search
capabilities!
敵泊地強襲反撃作戦: Enemy Harbor Assault Counter Attack Operation
重巡1軽巡1と精強駆逐隊による\n最精鋭艦隊で敵泊地を強襲せよ！\n【月一回実施:
Assault the enemy anchorage
with an elite fleet consisting
of one heavy cruiser, one light
cruiser and proficient
destroyers!
南西諸島離島哨戒作戦: Nansei Islands Remote Island Patrolling Operation
水上機母艦と護衛水雷戦隊による\n哨戒部隊を編成、南西諸島海域の\n哨戒作戦を実:
Form a patrol consisting of a
seaplane tender and an
escorting torpedo squadron,
and conduct a patrol operation
in the Nansei Islands Area!
南西諸島離島防衛作戦: Nansei Islands Remote Island Defense Operation
重巡2軽巡1駆逐艦2、さらに潜水\n艦1隻を含む、精強な遊撃部隊を\n編成。同遊:
Form an elite raiding force
including 2 CAs, 1 CL, 2 DDs
and 1 SS. With this fleet,
carry out the Operation!
南西諸島捜索撃滅戦: Nansei Islands Search and Destroy Mission
水上機母艦1軽巡1駆逐艦2を含む\n精鋭の捜索機動部隊を編成。南西\n諸島方面で:
Form an elite search task force
including 1 AV, 1 CL and
2 DDs. Deploy it, search for
the enemy, and destroy it!
精鋭無比の軽巡が率いる、軽巡1\n駆逐艦5からなる精強な水雷戦隊\nを編成、敵泊:
Form an elite torpedo squadron
consisting of a CL as flagship
and 5 DDs, and launch a night
attack on the enemy anchorage
to destroy the enemy fleet!
精鋭水雷戦隊を投入し、北方海域\nの敵情勢を強行偵察せよ！:
Deploy an elite torpedo
squadron and conduct an
enforced reconnaissance of
the enemy situation in the
Northern Area!
「航空母艦」を多数配備した輸送\n部隊で前線に航空機を輸送せよ！:
Transport aircraft to the front
lines with a transport group
full of aircraft carriers!
高練度「航空戦艦」複数を基幹と\nする強行輸送船団を出航させよ！:
Set sail with experienced
aviation battleships as the
main force in an enforced
convoy!
潜水艦と同支援艦艇による艦隊で\n北方海域の哨戒任務にあたれ！:
Undertake a patrol mission in
the Northern Area with a fleet
of submarines and support
vessels!
水雷戦隊にドラム缶を積載、北方\n方面の友軍への糧食補給を図れ！:
Load a torpedo squadron with
Drum Canisters and try to
deliver food supplies to our
friendly troops in the north!
練度向上のため艦隊演習を実施！\n(資源獲得の遠征ではありません):
Conduct fleet exercises to
improve your ships' proficiency!
(Not a resource-acquiring
expedition)
高練度「航空戦艦」戦隊を基幹と\nした艦隊の総合演習を実施せよ！:
Conduct a comprehensive fleet
exercise with experienced
aviation battleships as the
main force
高練度軽巡が率いる精鋭護衛艦隊\nで北方航路海上護衛を実施せよ！:
Conduct a marine escort
through the northern route with
an elite convoy led by a highly
skilled light cruiser!
快速かつ打撃力のある重巡戦隊を\n投入、敵後方補給線を遮断せよ!:
Bring in a fast and hard-hitting
heavy cruiser squadron, and
cut off the enemy's rear supply
line!
敵潜水艦の哨戒線を長躯突破し、\n有力な機動部隊で敵母港を叩け！:
Break through the enemy
submarine patrol line and
strike the enemy home port
with a powerful task force!
潜水艦2隻以上を伴う艦隊で、敵\n後方へ進出、通商破壊作戦実施！:
With a fleet of two or more
submarines, advance behind
the enemy and conduct a
trade destruction operation!
潜水艦3隻以上の艦隊で、西方海\n域の敵水上艦の活動を封鎖せよ！:
With a fleet of three or more
submarines, block the activity
of enemy surface ships in the
Western Area!
潜水艦3隻以上の艦隊を編成し、\n長距離派遣の演習を実施せよ！:
Form a fleet of three or more
submarines and conduct
long-range dispatch exercises!
潜水艦4隻以上の艦隊を編成し、\n遠方友軍勢力との連絡を試みよ！:
Form a fleet of four or more
submarines and try to reach
out distant friendly forces!
潜水艦4隻以上の艦隊を派遣し、\n海外艦との邂逅を試みよ！:
Dispatch a fleet of four or
more submarines in an
attempt to encounter a foreign
ship!
練習巡洋艦を旗艦で遠洋練習航海\nを実施、基礎練度向上に努めよ！:
Conduct high seas navigation
practice with a training cruiser
as your flagship to improve the
fleet's basic skills!
索敵力の高い水上機母艦を旗艦と\nする偵察艦隊を編成し、西方海域\n敵情勢の偵察:
Organize a reconnaissance
fleet under the command of an
AV with high search capabilities
to conduct reconnaissance of
the enemy situation!
潜水母艦を旗艦として潜水艦3隻\n以上から構成される精強な潜水艦\n隊を編成、西:
Form a proficient submarine
fleet consisting of a submarine
tender as flagship, along with
three or more submarines,
and carry out the operation!
旗艦に潜水母艦、同随伴護衛艦艇\nと潜水艦3隻以上から構成される\n西方潜水艦隊:
Break through the front lines
with a submarine fleet
consisting of an AS as flagship,
accompanying escort vessels,
and at least 3 SSs!
南方海域へ支援艦隊を出撃させ、\n主力艦隊の進撃を援護せよ！:
Launch a support fleet into the
Southern Area to support the
main fleet's advance!
[World 5 Node Support]
南方海域へ決戦支援を行う別動隊\nを展開し、主力艦隊を援護せよ！:
Deploy a detached force to
cover the main fleet in the
Southern Area and assist in
the decisive battle!
[World 5 Boss Support]
空母2隻を含むMO機動部隊を\n投入し、南方海域制海権を確保\nせよ！:
Deploy a MO task force which
includes two aircraft carriers
to secure sea control in the
Southern Area!
水上機母艦2隻を南方に展開し、\n哨戒用の水上機基地を建設せよ！:
Deploy two seaplane tenders
to the south and build a
seaplane land base for patrol!
水雷戦隊に輸送ドラム缶を満載、\n南方への鼠輸送作戦を遂行せよ！:
Load up a torpedo squadron
with Drum Canisters and carry
out a Rat Transport Operation
to the south!
可能な限り輸送ドラム缶を満載、\n南方への鼠輸送作戦を続行せよ！:
Load as much Drum Canisters
as possible and continue with
the Rat Transport Operation to
the south!
潜水母艦と潜水艦群による遠洋作\n戦を実施、敵戦力漸減に努めよ！:
Conduct high seas operations
with a submarine carrier and a
submarine group, and try to
reduce enemy forces!
軽巡旗艦と複数の水上機母艦で、\n水上機の前線輸送を実施せよ！:
Conduct transport of
seaplanes to the frontlines
with a light cruiser as flagship
and several seaplane tenders!
重巡旗艦、軽巡1駆逐艦3を含む\n艦隊を南方海域の要衝、ラバウル\n方面に進出さ:
Send a fleet including a CA as
flagship, 1 CL and 3 DDs in the
direction of Rabaul! Enemy air
raids are expected in this area.
Beware!
精鋭駆逐艦を連ねて輸送ドラム缶\n満載し、南方への強行鼠輸送作戦\nを遂行せよ！:
Load up a line of elite
DDs with Drums, and carry out
an Enforced Rat Transport
Operation to the south!
Prepare for an enemy ambush!
海防艦や駆逐艦による哨戒艦隊で\nブルネイ泊地沖対潜警戒を実施、\n同泊地周辺海:
Conduct an anti-submarine
patrol off Brunei Anchorage
with a fleet including DEs and
DDs to secure the waters
around the anchorage!
油田地帯から本土への輸送船団の\n護衛を行う。護衛空母と海防艦や\n軽巡級と駆逐:
Provide escort for the
transport group. Form a
proficient anti-submarine patrol
including a CVE, DEs, CLs and
DDs to escort the convoy!
大規模ミ船団の護衛作戦を行う。\n敵通商破壊部隊との会敵が予想さ\nれる。護衛空:
Provide escort for the large Mi
Convoy Escort. You can expect
to encounter enemy forces.
Maritime escort force, with a
CVL/CVE as flagship, sortie!
航空母艦2及び水上機母艦1を投入\nして、南西海域拠点への航空装備\n輸送作戦を:
Deploy 2 CVs and an AV to
conduct aerial equipment
transport operations to the
Southwestern Area base! And
load a lot of Drum Canisters!
海上護衛総隊によるボーキサイト\n輸送船団の護衛を実施する。護衛\n空母(または:
Provide escort for the bauxite
transport group with a general
maritime escort. Maritime
escort force, with a CVE/CVL
as flagship, set sail!
精強な重巡戦隊と水雷戦隊を中核\nとした有力なる艦隊で、南西海域\n深部を哨戒、:
Patrol the deep Southwestern
Area and, with a powerful fleet
centered around a CA and a
torpedo squadron, destroy any
enemy fleet on sight!
